TEXT.S: Willie Adams hya'ga qutux sa sinsyuw sinmung ptkura' mari' na Amirika' quw cyux niya' pcyuwagun. kinwagiq niya' ga 180 senci', kinz'usuw niya' ga 73 kiru gramu. kki'an niya' tkura' mari' ga pklahang sa kska' balay hiya'. ryax pincyuwagan niya' ga yasa knaki' niya' sa National Basketball League NBA krayryax. ryax 'nwah niya' mspung mari' ga aring kawas 1973 ruw mucing kawas 1983. Pllpgun 'nagal niya' tins' kwara' ga 3.6 tins' niya'. Willie Adams sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la.
